data.text: @JopetSy HI There, would you mind to provide us your booking reference -Elsa
@Jinkin03John We suggest you to stay tune on our website for latest news -Elsa

@Jinkin03John I'm afraid Hong Kong is not included in the special ticketing guideline at the moment. Cancellation fee and rebooking fee will be applied according to the terms and condition of your ticket.
@mouresesoriano Hi Moe, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@XL_Jef Hi Jeffrey, masks are available on request inflight for passenger who might be feeling unwell - Holly
@4954education Hi there, we have replied you through DM! - Holly
@ideaengine007 Hi there, mind DM us about this so that we can pass it to our IT team for follow-up? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@vltdelaney Hi Leia, mind giving us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@KreonRipper Hi there, we are closely monitoring the situation, you may check out our latest announcement here https://t.co/xJCN9N4RGJ - Holly

@reign226 I'm afraid Hong Kong is not included in the wavier at the moment. You may refer to  https://t.co/xJCN9N4RGJ to see if there is any special ticketing procedures that suit you from time to time. Our management may offer fee waiver depends on the actual situations. - Holly
@iammarlosomido Yes you are right. -Vinci

@thesharkfit Currently we do not have special ticketing arrangement for flights to / from Hong Kong. The waiver only covers itinerary involving Mainland China. If you consider to cancel / change the ticket now, charges would apply. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Ashishbhatt360 @PMOIndia @HMOIndia We're checking the details for you. To protect your privacy, we recommend you to remove your personal info from public tweet and we will assist you in DM directly. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @Sharmilla01 Hi Sharmila, our flights to Hong Kong are still operate normally, please stay tune on our website for latest news -Elsa

@mouresesoriano Currently we do not have special ticketing arrangement for flights to / from Hong Kong. The waiver only covers itinerary involving Mainland China. If you consider to cancel / change the ticket now, charges would apply. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@saurabhRV You may refer to https://t.co/jZBG2QWgCU for an update. -Vinci
@stnaresh Hi Naresh, would you mind to DM us their booking reference -Elsa
@gouldalice92 Hi Alice, sorry for the late response. Can you inbox us with his eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@reign226 We are afraid not. - Liz
@miyuki_kawamoto Hi there, mask are available on request inflight for passengers who are felling unwell. You may ask our cabin crew when you onboard. Thank you. - Liz
@aubreygatxca Hi there, may you share the eTicket number and passenger name to us through DM so we can check it for you? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

From our family at Cathay Pacific to yours, happy Chinese New Year. Welcome the Year of the Rat 🐭 with your own Chinese New Year wish. Pause the video to receive and share your Fai Chun wish. Kung Hei Fat Choi! https://t.co/Fi0dRbpYR1

@reign226 Hi there, with immediate effect, rebooking, rerouting and refund charges will be waived for passengers arriving to or departing from Mainland China between 24 January 2020 and 29 February 2020. For more details, you may refer to: https://t.co/rKIP9DnKek Thank you! - Liz

data.text: @romain_girard1 Our apologies, Romain. Do you mind sending us DM with passenger full name, eTicket number, and contact email so we can look into it and get in touch with you afterwards? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Suranjeeta2 May we clarify that you have filled it in and returned it to the team before? If so, you don't have to fill in again. Do DM us if you have supplementary info so we can forward to the team for investigation. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Fraggle85 Currently we do not have special ticketing arrangement for flights to / from / via Hong Kong. The waiver only covers itinerary involving Mainland China. If you consider to change the ticket, charges would apply. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@anktdshmkh Hi Aniket, thanks for getting in touch. Do you mind sending us DM via below link so we can look into it? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@robvandegroep Can you DM us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@go_dizzy_go We recommend you to file the case online via https://t.co/s5reyVMJLe as soon as you have completed your journey. -Vinci

@AmitDShah11 Hi Amit, passengers are entitled to have cabin baggage allowance up to total 7kg - one cabin bag within 56 cm x 36 cm x 23 cm and one small item within 15 cm x 30 cm x 40 cm (https://t.co/HKbRLQ9aTc) . -Vinci

data.text: @vikasbhardwaj Sorry for the system glitch. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. Do you mind sending us DM with the setting page of the app (with app ID) so we can ask mobile team to look into it? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@jennz009 We are sorry to hear your disappointment. May you share your eTicket number and passenger name to us through DM so we can pass to our team for the follow up?- Liz

@Suranjeeta2 Hi there, as we can see our Customer Relations Team sent you an email with an attached questionnaire. 
May you please check if you received it or not? -Ella

@SydAbd @cathaypacificIN We are sorry to hear your disappointment :( ,May you share your case reference, passenger name and email contact to us through DM so we can urged our team for the follow up? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@ezrenamarwan Hi there, could you please inbox us your baggage tag number, e-ticket number, English full name and email?
 -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@enjo888 Hi there, we have just replied you through DM! - Liz
@ABroadwaBrain Hi there, can you inbox us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Eneceee Hi there, we haven't received any direct message from you. Mind sending us DM so we know your concern?  -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@samvaibh Our apologies. May you provide us your eTicket number, passenger name, baggage tag number / file reference and contact email via Direct Message so the baggage team can contact you for follow-up? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Jack_P_Alves May you DM us with your full name and eTicket number so we can have a look? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@gouldalice92 Sorry to hear this. Passengers are advised to contact us 72 hours in advance with MEDA form if they require not to serve peanut snacks in the cabin. Further info can be found on https://t.co/fQH19g6x7G -Vinci
@PratikK19701796 Hi Pratik, can you DM us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@suzanns718 Hi there, may you share your eTicket number and passenger name through DM so that we can check it for you? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@karjk We are sorry about that :( May you share your eTicket number and passenger name to us through DM so that we can check it for you? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@davenielsen We are sorry to hear your disappointment:( May you share your eTicket number and passenger name to us through DM so that we can check it for you?  - Liz
@aguyindcity You are most welcome. Just DM us if you have any enquiry:) - Anna
@aguyindcity You may contact them or send us the information through DM:) - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@aguyindcity Hi there. Sorry that we do not block seats for passengers but we may check if you are able to reserve seat. Mind providing us your eTicket number (13 digits) and full name for checking please? Thank you. - Anna

@MQQW119 Hi Michelle, we are deeply sorry to let you down. Mind providing us your eTicket number, full name and email address through DM please? We will pass your case to Customer Relations Team. Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @honey1925 Please kindly share your eTicket no and full name in DM - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@VivienneChow Our frontline staff are reminded to maintain good personal and environmental hygiene, and to remain alert and vigilant while being on the lookout for passengers presenting with infectious disease symptoms. -Elsa

@VivienneChow Due to the evolving information from health authorities, we will allow crew members and front-line airport employees to wear surgical face masks when on duty at their discretion. 

-Elsa
@honey1925 Hi Labdhi, we are so sorry about that, may i know which flight you are referring to? Would you mind to provide us your booking reference -Elsa
@_mh15_ Wi-Fi or Bluetooth-enabled devices should be switched off or set to flight mode for the duration of your flight. - Chloe
@bmartel637 May we know the flight is operated by which airline? -Elsa
@_mh15_ Bluetooth connection is not available in our entertainment system. - Chloe
@junkiatl It is operational reason. Hope for understanding. - Anna
@junkiatl We are afraid that there is no business class is available for 13FEB but economy only. - Anna
@junkiatl Hi there. Check out on our website https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr :) Thanks.- Anna

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text: @HelenaS77925782 Hi Helena, we are so sorry for the disappointment. Please send us DM with your eTicket number and passenger’s name so we can check. https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@doshivatsal7 Unfortunately we do not. - Chloe
@doshivatsal7 Hi there, im afraid we do not offer free additional baggage allowance -Elsa
@asamefenamatt Yes, you will. - Chloe

@asamefenamatt You may get your boarding pass at the airport as your departure airport does not support mobile boarding pass. Only passport and travel documents (if applicable) are needed upon check-in at the airport. - Chloe
